name: accounts_list
description: List all accounts in your Cloudflare account

name: set_active_account
description: Set active account to be used for tool calls that require accountId

name: kv_namespaces_list
description: List all of the kv namespaces in your Cloudflare account

name: kv_namespace_create
description: Create a new kv namespace in your Cloudflare account

name: kv_namespace_delete
description: Delete a kv namespace in your Cloudflare account

name: kv_namespace_get
description: Get details of a kv namespace in your Cloudflare account

name: kv_namespace_update
description: Update the title of a kv namespace in your Cloudflare account

name: workers_list
description: List all Workers in your Cloudflare account

name: workers_get_worker
description: Get the details of a Cloudflare Worker

name: workers_get_worker_code
description: Get the source code of a Cloudflare Worker

name: r2_buckets_list
description: List r2 buckets in your Cloudflare account

name: r2_bucket_create
description: Create a new r2 bucket in your Cloudflare account

name: r2_bucket_get
description: Get details about a specific R2 bucket

name: r2_bucket_delete
description: Delete an R2 bucket

name: d1_databases_list
description: List all of the D1 databases in your Cloudflare account

name: d1_database_create
description: Create a new D1 database in your Cloudflare account

name: d1_database_delete
description: Delete a d1 database in your Cloudflare account

name: d1_database_get
description: Get a D1 database in your Cloudflare account

name: d1_database_query
description: Query a D1 database in your Cloudflare account

name: hyperdrive_configs_list
description: List Hyperdrive configurations in your Cloudflare account

name: hyperdrive_config_create
description: Create a new Hyperdrive configuration in your Cloudflare account

name: hyperdrive_config_delete
description: Delete a Hyperdrive configuration in your Cloudflare account

name: hyperdrive_config_get
description: Get details of a specific Hyperdrive configuration in your Cloudflare account

name: hyperdrive_config_edit
description: Edit (patch) a Hyperdrive configuration in your Cloudflare account

name: workers_builds_set_active_worker
description: Sets the active Worker ID for subsequent calls.

name: workers_builds_list_builds
description: Lists builds for a Cloudflare Worker.

name: workers_builds_get_build
description: Retrieves details for a specific build by its UUID, including build and deploy commands.

name: workers_builds_get_build_logs
description: Fetches the logs for a Cloudflare Workers build by its UUID.

name: query_worker_observability
description: Queries Workers Observability API to analyze logs and metrics from your Cloudflare Workers. Supports listing events, calculating metrics, and finding specific invocations

name: observability_keys
description: Discovers available data fields in your Workers logs including metadata fields, worker-specific fields, and custom logged fields

name: observability_values
description: Finds available values for specific fields in Workers logs to help build precise filters for analytics queries

name: get_ai_data
description: Retrieves AI-related data, including traffic from AI user agents, as well as popular models and model tasks

name: list_autonomous_systems
description: Lists ASes; filter by location and sort by population size

name: get_as_details
description: Retrieves detailed info for a specific ASN

name: get_domains_ranking
description: Gets top or trending domains

name: get_domain_rank_details
description: Gets domain rank details

name: get_dns_data
description: Retrieves DNS query data to 1.1.1.1, including timeseries, summaries, and breakdowns by dimensions like `queryType`

name: get_email_routing_data
description: Retrieves Email Routing data, including timeseries, and breakdowns by dimensions like `encrypted`

name: get_email_security_data
description: Retrieves Email Security data, including timeseries, and breakdowns by dimensions like `threatCategory`

name: get_http_data
description: Retrieves HTTP request data, including timeseries, and breakdowns by dimensions like `deviceType`

name: get_ip_details
description: Provides details about a specific IP address

name: get_internet_services_ranking
description: Gets top Internet services

name: get_internet_quality_data
description: Retrieves a summary or time series of bandwidth, latency, or DNS response time from the Radar Internet Quality Index

name: get_internet_speed_data
description: Retrieves summary of bandwidth, latency, jitter, and packet loss, from the previous 90 days of Cloudflare Speed Test

name: get_l3_attack_data
description: Retrieves L3 attack data, including timeseries, top attacks, and breakdowns by dimensions like `protocol`

name: get_l7_attack_data
description: Retrieves L7 attack data, including timeseries, top attacks, and breakdowns by dimensions like `mitigationProduct`

name: get_traffic_anomalies
description: Lists traffic anomalies and outages; filter by AS, location, start date, and end date

name: scan_url
description: Scans a URL via [Cloudflareâ€™s URL Scanner](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/investigate/url-scanner/)
